body.name: AUVON Ergonomic Anti-slip Wheelchair Cushions, Front High Rear Low Thick Seat Cushion with Hump Design Avoid Slipping, Chair Cushions for Knock Knees, Sciatica, Back, Coccyx, Pressure Sore, Ulcer Pain
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 16 hrs 22 mins
features: Anti-slip Design. The chair cushion features a hump design to help with knock knees, and the front-high rear-low design avoids sliding forward and poor posture. Unlike typical seat cushions on the market, this wheelchair cushion is specially made for wheelchair users with muscle weakness or poor balance. (Consult your healthcare provider before use.)

Thickened Ergonomic Design. The concave curves of this ergonomic chair cushion help relieve the pressure on the sciatic and coccyx from prolonged wheelchair use. The wheelchair pillows feature a U-shaped cutout to reduce tailbone compression. The mobility scooter cushion is the "long-sitting saver" to relieve discomfort of wheelchair.

Skin-Friendly & Waterproof. The orthopedic seat cushion features ventilated memory foam with air holes to reduce stuffy feelings during long sitting. The inner waterproof membrane prevents sweat or urine from eroding the memory foam. The detachable cover is machine washable to keep the coccyx cushion fresh (do not wash the memory foam).

Secure & Safe. With anti-slip bottom and adjustable strap, this tailbone cushion stays in place on wheelchairs for home or outdoor use. on the wheelchair, providing stable support for home and outdoor use. This memory foam cushion offers stable support and maximizes anti-slip safety for users.

Wide Compatibility for Convenient Use. AUVON orthopedic seat cushion (18" x 16" x 3") fits most wheelchairs around 17"-18" long and 16"-17" wide, and it can turn seats of scooters, office chairs, car seats, and dining chairs into comfortable seats. Precautions: Attach additional straps for enhanced stability.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Safety Strap, Waterproof & Removable Cover, Carry Handle

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Memory foam is non-washable. Machine wash the removable cover cold on a gentle cycle. Avoid bleach or dry cleaning. After washing, allow the cover to air dry naturally before use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect solution to wheelchair discomfort.
reviews.reviewText: Our wheelchair seat is only 17" wide but since this cushion fits tightly, it stays in place without the strap. Mom no longer complains of pain and discomfort and she no longer slides forward in the wheelchair which was a constant problem. I also installed a seatbelt but even on days when I forget to buckle it Mom remains in a perfect and comfortable seated position all day. Life has been SO MUCH easier since we started using this cushion. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Provides comfort and support which was not there in the cushion that came with her chair.
reviews.reviewText: My aging aunt spends a lot of the day in her wheelchair. This cushion provides a great comfort to her. She is about100#, so I can't say how it would be for a heavier person. It seems very thick and supportive. I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick Comfort Cushion to Raise Seat Height for Wheelchairs
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is not soft, it is fairly firm with a cut-out for the sciatic nerve. It is nevertheless the most comfortable cushion I have ever seen. I recommend it for wheelchairs where the seat height needs to be raised for tall people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large size gives comfort
reviews.reviewText: Almost 19" wide in the front, 3" thick at the back, and 4" thick on the front sides. The front is also dipped to about 2" thick where your thighs rest, making a very comfortable trough. The gap in the back relieves any weight that would be on your tailbone.The bottom is covered with small hard silicon or plastic "dots" that grip other material, holding it in place.A detachable adjustable strap allows the cushion to be fixed to the chair or seat back, so it further resists moving. It won't be pulled off when exiting the chair.There is an attached handle for carrying that's part of a removeable cover for cleaning. The foam inside is not washable.The extra width and thigh positioning make this a great wheel chair pad.It also would make a great car seat cushion or just a cushion on a hard chair. The foam is dense enough that it gives good support without lifting too much.4 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Straps come off easily Easy to loose

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mom loves it!
reviews.reviewText: My Mom recently transitioned to a long-term nursing care facility and complained that the flat 'pressure-relieving' wheelchair cushion they provided was very uncomfortable and caused a sore on her rear end, so I bought this to replace it. She said it is very comfortable and she no longer has a sore!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits chair right and will not slip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This seat cushion is extremely stiff and not comfortable for an elderly person. I sent it back.
It serves its purpose of relieving butt issues and slouching while sitting on my power wheelchair at least 8 hours a day! very happy and satisfied!!!
Was way too small for my wheelchair. I should have done more research before I purchased would not recommend.
